Interface UI

All Known Implementing Classes:
GUI, TUI
public interface UI
The UI interface defines the contract for user interfaces in the Galaxy Trucker game. It provides methods for displaying game information, handling user interactions, and updating the game state.

    • launchGUI

      static void launchGUI(it.polimi.ingsw.galaxytrucker.Model.GamePackage.Game game, VirtualClient rmiClient, SocketClient socketClient)
      Launches the GUI application with the specified game and clients.
      Parameters:
      game - The game instance to be used in the GUI.
      rmiClient - The RMI client for server communication.
      socketClient - The Socket client for server communication.
